      • convertStringToDate

        public static java.util.Date convertStringToDate(java.lang.String valueStr)
                                          throws MbedCloudException
        Converts string following RFC3339 into dates.

        Similar to convertRfc3339Timestamp(String) but using Joda time implementation.

        Parameters:
        valueStr - string representing a date and following RFC3339
        Returns:
        corresponding date
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if string does not follow RFC3339
        See Also:
        DateTimeFormatter.parseDateTime(String)
